diagnosis: The primary issue preventing profitability is the lack of trades being executed.
rootCauses: Overly stringent entry conditions resulting in no trades being taken
Misalignment of HTF and ITF criteria preventing signal generation
Lack of clear trend identification causing missed opportunities in trending markets

suggestions.description: Adjust HTF and ITF alignment requirements to increase trade opportunities.
codeChanges: src/config/executionFilterConfig.ts: Adjust `requireHtfAlignment` to `true` for all symbols to ensure trades are only taken in clear market conditions.
suggestions.reasoning: Enabling HTF alignment will ensure that trades are taken in the direction of the main trend, increasing the likelihood of successful trades.

suggestions.description: Lower the minimum confluence score required to allow more trades.
suggestions.reasoning: Lowering the confluence score requirement will increase the number of potential trades without significantly compromising entry quality.

suggestions.description: Adjust the stop loss buffer to better accommodate volatility.
suggestions.reasoning: A larger SL buffer can prevent premature stop-outs in volatile conditions, improving trade survivability.

suggestions.description: Increase the risk-reward ratio target to capture larger market moves.
suggestions.reasoning: Increasing the R:R target will allow trades more room to develop, capturing larger profits on successful trades.

expectedImpact: These changes are expected to increase the number of trades taken by the strategy, align trades with the prevailing market trend, and improve overall trade performance through better SL and TP management. The goal is to see an increase in profitable months and an overall positive PnL.
